tags: Curt Teich Postcard Archives Digital Collection
description: Meterorite Moutain, near Canyon Diablo, Arizona. Fred Harvey series. Several miles southeast of Canyon Diablo is a remarkable place called Meteorite Mountain, where it is supposed that a colossal sky wanderer once fell. The creater cavity marking the crash into the earth is a mile wide and over 700 feet deep. Large fragments of meteoric stone containing small diamonds have been found near by.
